Author: @night23412
Comment: 19-23 batch senior here, don't take this video as motivation to not care about CGPA at all. It is crucial to balance both things appropriately, during your first two years give more important to CGPA and during your last 2 give importance to practical skills (DSA, projects and internships if you're in a CSE-related branch). Source: 9 pointer with super dream offer
